title: Modeling and Simulation-Integrated Inquiry Learning Curriculum for Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering concepts and computer literacy
context.additional_context: Professional development course for pre-service/in-service teachers emphasizing inquiry-based learning through modeling/simulation tools for real engineering problems. Hybrid environment combining online platforms and offline practice

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematical models suitable for engineering problems and explain verification procedures.
Learners can interpret and analyze model results using simulation tools.
Learners can apply modeling and simulation outcomes to engineering decision-making.
Learners can document the modeling process and present results in team-based projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
